title: Cassandra Summit - Join us December 12 -13!
description:
Cassandra Summit is back in San Jose! Join us on December 12 & 13 for the most comprehensive Data + AI conference of 2023! Developers, engineers, and data practitioners alike, this is your conference to sharpen your technical expertise, network with other open-source enthusiasts, and learn more about advancements made to Apache Cassandra! 

Click here to register now
https://cvent.me/Q4EK8x?RefId=Digital+YouTube

Use code below to save 20%:
CS2023DYT20 



About DataStax:
DataStax is the company behind the massively scalable, highly available, cloud-native NoSQL data platform built on Apache Cassandra™. DataStax gives developers and enterprises the freedom to run data in any cloud, Kubernetes, hybrid or bare metal at global scale with zero downtime and zero lock-in. More than 450 of the world’s leading enterprises including Capital One, Cisco, Comcast, Delta Airlines, Macy’s, McDonald’s, Safeway, Sony, and Walmart use DataStax to build transformational data architectures for real-world outcomes. For more, visit DataStax.com and @DataStax.

About DataStax Developer:
On the DataStax Developers YouTube channel, you can find tutorials, workshops and much more to help you learn and stay updated with the latest information on Apache Cassandra©.  Visit https://datastax.com/dev for more free learning resources.

transcript.text: did you know that there's only one data n aai event this year that will have speakers from companies like apple Netflix Uber meta Bloomberg you know the companies that actually do things at like some serious ginormous scale what I like to call the doers and not the posers December 12th and 13th at the San Jose Convention Center because your time is so valuable the Linux Foundation is holding two important events in one place the AI dodev open source generative Ai and Summit and the cassander summit that's a lot of summit so if you're tired of three-hour vendor Keynotes where they talk about how you're going to play in their wall Garden then this is the place you need to be open and local is all the hype in Ai and this is the community of users actually doing it if generative AI is your jam then you'll be hearing from Cutting Edge companies like llama index and hugging face love that name if Cassandra is more your thing then there'll be talks digging into things like asset transactions and the new improved indexing and hello Vector search and this is from the doers they'll be all we process PAB byeson data every day and right after they'll be all want to hang out coffee don't delay sign up today you just need to be there you're probably in Holiday code freeze anyway and use this discount code to save a cool 20% off and what can I say you're welcome and hey 2024 is not going to get any easier with AI and data let's do this as a community and work together I hope to see you there
